'''3.13.23''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher]] that was released on April 22, 2025.

== Additions ==
* Added "Relaxing Farm Morning" Soothing Scene
** It can be accessed by pressing the button in bottom-left corner of the image shown in Java Edition and Bedrock Edition tabs.

== Changes ==
* Removed the [[April Fools' Day jokes#Minecraft Launcher 3|spooky skills]]
